articles.description: Wholesale changes and 7,000-mile round trips - BBC Sport tells the story of how Chelsea won the Conference League.
articles.title: Uefa Conference League: The story of Chelsea's successful European campaign

articles.description: Real Sociedad midfielder Martin Zubimendi is set to have a medical before completing a £51m switch to Arsenal.
articles.title: Arsenal: Martin Zubimendi set for medical before £51m move from Real Sociedad

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim believes it will do his players good to leave Kuala Lumpur with the sound of boos ringing in their ears after a 1-0 loss to ASEAN All-Stars.
articles.title: Man Utd booed off after 1-0 defeat by ASEAN All-Stars in Malaysia

articles.description: England promote Jamie Smith to open the batting in Harry Brook’s first one-day international since being appointed captain.
articles.title: England v West Indies: Jamie Smith to open in first ODI at Edgbaston

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Betis vs Chelsea in the UEFA Conference League
articles.title: Real Betis vs Chelsea LIVE: Conference League final score, stats & updates

articles.description: Riot police in the Polish city of Wroclaw use a water cannon to stop trouble between Chelsea and Real Betis fans before the Uefa Conference League final.
articles.title: Conference League final: Arrests made as fans of Chelsea and Betis clash

articles.description: Emma Raducanu's miserable record against Iga Swiatek continues as the defending champion dominates their French Open second-round match.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Emma Raducanu loses to Iga Swiatek at Roland Garros

articles.description: Norway's Casper Ruud criticises the ATP's ranking system and describes it "like a rat race" which forces players to compete with injuries.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Casper Ruud criticises 'rat race' ATP points system after second-round exit

articles.description: Police get an extension to continue questioning a man arrested on suspicion of attempted murder.
articles.title: Liverpool parade: Police get more time to question suspect

articles.description: New South Wales beat Queensland 18-6 to take 1-0 series lead in State of Origin.
articles.title: State of Origin: New South Wales beat Queensland 18-6 to take 1-0 series lead
